definition: abbr. for 朝鮮|朝鲜[Chao2 xian3] Korea
imperial or royal court/government/dynasty/reign of a sovereign or emperor/court or assembly held by a sovereign or emperor/to make a pilgrimage to/facing/towards
half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half

sentences.english: He warned us about the serious situation of Byland Korea.
sentences.chinese: 他向我们谈了朝鲜半岛的严重形势。

sentences.english: China upholds and stays committed to peace and stability of the Korean Peninsula.
sentences.chinese: 中方一贯主张并坚定致力于维护朝鲜半岛和平与稳定。

sentences.english: That meeting led to an unprecedented détente on the divided Korean Peninsula.
sentences.chinese: 此次会晤为朝鲜半岛创造出前所未有的缓和局势。

sentences.english: China strongly urged Pyongyang to promote denuclearisation of the Korean peninsula.
sentences.chinese: 中国此前强烈敦促平壤促进朝鲜半岛的无核化。

sentences.english: What would the North expect to do by heightening the tension on the Korean Peninsula?
sentences.chinese: 朝鲜加剧朝鲜半岛紧张，它居心何在？

sentences.english: Settlements filled in on the Peninsula, West Newport, Balboa Island and Lido Isle.
sentences.chinese: 住区填补朝鲜半岛，西新港，巴尔博亚岛和丽都岛。

sentences.english: Yellow dust was expected to hit the Korean peninsula.
sentences.chinese: 黄沙将要侵袭朝鲜半岛。

sentences.english: Reconciliation on the Korean Peninsula is moving haltingly.
sentences.chinese: 朝鲜半岛和解进程依然曲折。

sentences.english: What is your expectation of China-ROK relations and the situation on the Korean Peninsula in the coming year?
sentences.chinese: 中方对中韩关系和朝鲜半岛局势有何期待？

sentences.english: North Korea warned that U. S. -South Korean plans for military maneuvers put the peninsula on the brink of war.
sentences.chinese: 朝鲜警告，美韩军演计划将朝鲜半岛推向战争边缘。

sentences.english: The two countries instead conducted the drill on the east side of the Korean peninsula.
sentences.chinese: 两国改在朝鲜半岛东测举行了军演。

sentences.english: Finally in 2066 AD Hwarang Road, leaders from the entire Korean peninsula reunification.
sentences.chinese: 终于在公元六六年由花郎道领袖统一整个朝鲜半岛。

sentences.english: We both showed our commission in denuclearizing the Korean Peninsula through dialogue and consultation.
sentences.chinese: 我们都表示坚持通过对话协商，解决朝鲜半岛核问题。

sentences.english: We both want stability on the Korean Peninsula and in Pakistan.
sentences.chinese: 我们都希望朝鲜半岛和巴基斯坦的稳定。

sentences.english: Korean waters in the western boundary of the Korean peninsula has been divided differences.
sentences.chinese: 朝韩在朝鲜半岛西部海域的边界划分上一直存在分歧。

sentences.english: Preserved now on the Korean Peninsula are 233 inscriptions on ancient bronzes and stone tablets that are related to the Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 现存朝鲜半岛和唐朝关联的金石碑志共有233篇。

definition: Ryukyu Islands/Okinawa 沖繩|冲绳[Chong1 sheng2] and other islands of modern Japan
North and South Korea/bilateral Korean relations
Panmunjeom, the Joint Security Area in the Korean demilitarized zone
Diaoyu Islands, claimed by China but controlled by Japan as the Senkaku Islands, also called the Pinnacle Islands
